name: Hit&Run
description:
Hit and run is a game in which you have to survive inside a labyrinth as long as possible. The player has 90 seconds of initial time. Which can increase or decrease as you play. Inside the labyrinth the player can find three types of cubes to shoot them: 

  • Green Cubes: That grant a second of time and give a point. 
  •  Yellow Cubes: That grant five seconds and five points.
  • Red Cubes: That subtract ten seconds and remove ten points. 

 Controls 
 The main controls are: 

  • The W,A,S,D keys control the main character. 
  • The mouse controls the camera. 
  • The left button of the mouse is used to shoot. 
  • The Q key quit the game. 
  • The R key restart the game.
